Hotel_Name: The Park City Grand Plaza Kensington Hotel
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The hotel provides cell phone at no cost and free data Space to hang or place belongings Close to Tube grocery store and restaurants Room has refrigerator and excellent toiletries

Hotel_Name: The Park City Grand Plaza Kensington Hotel
Negative_Review: I really didn t like much the WiFi because it was on and off It was not that fast but also not that slow
Positive_Review: I love everything about my room I also love their staff They were really accommodating and friendly The hotel is really great for me since it is situated on a quiet neighborhood Earl s Court Rd station was just a 10 minute walk as well as the bars shops restaurants etc Location is really good

Hotel_Name: The Park City Grand Plaza Kensington Hotel
Negative_Review: Since we had nice sunny weather perfect holdiday
Positive_Review: The location price ratio is amazing Walking distance to Kensington High Street Kensington Gardens and Holland Park If you want to explore London do it via public transport 2 tube lines reachable under 10 min Bus stops are even closer Hotel stuff is good and supportive We had a nice stay

Hotel_Name: The Park City Grand Plaza Kensington Hotel
Negative_Review: There was no business center for checking the mail and others during family was sleeping while there was a sign of it It is better to make the space for it
Positive_Review: I liked the atmosphere and the location The staff was willing to take care of my little child

Hotel_Name: The Park City Grand Plaza Kensington Hotel
Negative_Review: The lobby appeared to be very spacious in the photos a place you could hang out in but it s very small and there are no amenities here The restaurant was closed No bar for a late night glass of wine The fridge in the room was quite noisy which we solved by having the room fan running on the second night to allow for easy sleeping
Positive_Review: The rooms were small but clean and comfortable with the little things that help make a hotel stay nicer like tea making facilities Location location location The neighbourhood is absolutely sensational especially the walk towards Kensington High Street Beautiful architecture with lots of fancy cars parked on the streets so that the boys had something to gawk at Lots of pubs shops restaurants and bars within easy walking distance Buses cabs and Earls court station a mere 5 minutes away

Hotel_Name: The Park City Grand Plaza Kensington Hotel
Negative_Review: Air condition was very poor despite having on coldest setting the room located on the 4th floor was very warm there was is also a lack of power points in the room on 1 x double to shared between kettle etc Cooked breakfast was very mediocre most things where deep fried Overall expensive for the money and wouldn t use again
Positive_Review: Room was very quiet and nicely furnished

Hotel_Name: The Park City Grand Plaza Kensington Hotel
Negative_Review: Poor English with most of the staff really hard pillows and dubious stains on bathroom walls room 209
Positive_Review: Restaurant on site does close early so they kick you out at 10 00pm iron and large room safe in room

Hotel_Name: The Park City Grand Plaza Kensington Hotel
Negative_Review: Bed was a bit soft for my personal liking would have been nice if breakfast was included
Positive_Review: Great location nice lobby comfortable room with nice bathroom and separate desk working area professional and helpful staff

Hotel_Name: The Park City Grand Plaza Kensington Hotel
Negative_Review: The staff was not good about their service We had to carry the bags to the room without being asked for assistance Even we have asked the staff seems not to care much about having good services to customers
Positive_Review: The room was good Location is good

Hotel_Name: The Park City Grand Plaza Kensington Hotel
Negative_Review: Wifi not so good Room was renovated but still needed some decoration fixes Overall was good
Positive_Review: Excellent room very spacious Great location for the things we were doing in London Lovely area with lots of choice of restaurants Room cleaned every day to a great standard

Hotel_Name: The Park City Grand Plaza Kensington Hotel
Negative_Review: Nothing to complain about here
Positive_Review: Lovely modern immaculate hotel extending to the rooms We had a large room with a large comfy bed at the front of the hotel no complaints about street noise traffic etc my partner and i had a restful nights sleep We have stayed here twice and would return again

Hotel_Name: The Park City Grand Plaza Kensington Hotel
Negative_Review: Nothing to complain about Didn t eat in the hotel so can t comment on breakfast or food served
Positive_Review: Have stayed a few times now and certainly one of the better hotels in London Rooms are a good size bed is comfortable you get a mobile phone to use during your stay with includes internet and certain calls Sky box in your room which is a new addition

Hotel_Name: The Park City Grand Plaza Kensington Hotel
Negative_Review: Booking a double room and put into a twin room with bed together just wasn t acceptable They did change after I saw them at the desk Me and my wife stayed here about 5 years ago and it was amazing and I think over the years it s gone down hill Rooms were showing cracks in places Especially the bathroom WiFi is useless
Positive_Review: The bed was comfy and having a fridge was very handy Having sky was a nice extra

Hotel_Name: The Park City Grand Plaza Kensington Hotel
Negative_Review: A room service menu in the room would have been nice
Positive_Review: The bed was extremely comfortable the room was totally quiet and I loved going upstairs to the bathroom it was very private and all completely clean Breakfast was great lots of choice and good value The staff were all very friendly and kind The hotel is located on a quiet but very elegant street This hotel is going on my list of great places to stay in London

Hotel_Name: The Park City Grand Plaza Kensington Hotel
Negative_Review: The WiFi signal wasn t the best from our room but that wasn t really a problem it was still quite good
Positive_Review: It was a really cozy room and had basically everything you could need safe fridge kettle tea coffee TV and sky box a safe WiFi and good storage space All the facilities were really good

Hotel_Name: The Park City Grand Plaza Kensington Hotel
Negative_Review: no heating system in the rooms they had toads a portable heater that waste enough the plugs in the rooms we rent working and staff came to fix my kettle for coffee but putting it on the floor quite discusting i will never go there again even by complaining they didn t even apologies awful experience bad service im really disappointed wish they could do anything to arrangee it but receptionist was rude and manager useless what a shame dont go there
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: The Park City Grand Plaza Kensington Hotel
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The hotel had this fantastic mobile device that gave you free data and phone calls whilst in and around London I saved the battery on my phone and used theirs for google maps and checking out information whilst away from the hotel Will go back to the hotel again just for this Made my life much easier as my mobile battery is always flat when I use too much data

Hotel_Name: The Park City Grand Plaza Kensington Hotel
Negative_Review: Wifi wasn t very good its not only me the rest of the family also had a hard time using the wifi low signal Lucky we had 4G service for those coming from outside Europe this might be an issue
Positive_Review: Great staff Amazing location not so close to the tube but not far either and very spacious room We even got an early checkin which was very good

Hotel_Name: The Park City Grand Plaza Kensington Hotel
Negative_Review: Nothing to complain about
Positive_Review: I loved everything about this hotel it was immaculately clean throughout Lovely decor even extending into the rooms unlike some 4star hotels that have a nice reception but your usually left disappointed by the time you enter your room not with this hotel Very nice friendly staff

Hotel_Name: The Park City Grand Plaza Kensington Hotel
Negative_Review: The bathroom fittings were old and loose The heating system in the room couldn t be adjusted very easily and made the air in the room very dry
Positive_Review: Our three bedroom was very spacious considering the average room space in London The location of the hotel though in a residential area is relatively close to V A Museum Science Museum and Natural History Museum Gloucester Road Station is only 750 m distant

Hotel_Name: The Park City Grand Plaza Kensington Hotel
Negative_Review: I booked one night in a triple suite for my wife s birthday and just to make sure I was happy with the room I attended the hotel a week before our stay Rm 202 allocated but when we arrived on the day we had been moved to another room that wasn t as nice When I politely complained we were offered another room which was even worse Finally after some hard negotiation we got 202 back The room was 340 but no breakfast included I agreed to pay the 9 90 pp but when we went downstairs we were ignored initially by staff chatting to each other The price only covered a cold buffet continental and did not include a cooked breakfast which was an extra 14 I really think breakfast should be included considering the price of the room but at the very least surely 10 should cover anything you want like most other hotels we ve stayed in The ambiance of the basement restaurant was a little oppressive so coupled with the pricing we decided to eat out I would emphasise that we had a lovely and comfortable stay but the breakfast situation was really disappointing and considering the quality of the hotel it was rather stingy
Positive_Review: Nice clean room

Hotel_Name: The Park City Grand Plaza Kensington Hotel
Negative_Review: We received an email inviting us to check in the morning of our first night which had the total cost at more than 4 times the price we had booked at This was an error but it took 3 international calls to the hotel from Berlin where we were to find this out It was a stressful start to the stay as we are on our honeymoon The beds are very firm
Positive_Review: The room is lovely the staff are all very friendly and helpful The hotel is in a very nice part of London

Hotel_Name: The Park City Grand Plaza Kensington Hotel
Negative_Review: Reception clerk Mr Redzoan is a liar and wouldn t take responsibility for his actions before the hotel s Reservation Centre I enquired about the possibility of changing my reservation but clearly it wasn t worth it so I decided to keep it as it was Mr Redzoan knew this he was standing in front of me with Booking com on the phone when we all agreed to keep the reservation as it was Still they considered it changed and charged me more than 600 on my credit card without my authorization And that was for one night At the Reception they simply said Contact our Reservation Centre tomorrow Monday The Reservation Centre never replied my email Fortunately Booking com did the right thing and reimbursed me I hope they got their money back from this hotel and I hope they penalized the hotel Be careful don t trust this hotel
Positive_Review: Some of the staff who were ashamed of their colleague and the whole situation doing their best to help

Hotel_Name: The Park City Grand Plaza Kensington Hotel
Negative_Review: I m pretty surprised at the score for this hotel Location is very good for London but otherwise the place is a typical characterless impassive not very well maintained average London hotel Very impersonal desk staff Not rude at all but not welcoming either Bad level of room maintenance Towel rails sagging out of walls on loose screws faulty toilet flush really hot room with poor temperature control Shame with a little extra effort the place could actually become quite good
Positive_Review: Good location Clean room Very reasonably priced breakfast Reasonably priced taxi deal with partner firm to airport

Hotel_Name: The Park City Grand Plaza Kensington Hotel
Negative_Review: Nothing comes to mind
Positive_Review: Very kind staff Room was very spacious comfortable and clean Location close to Natural History Museum and a supermarket for some quick groceries Breakfast was quite good as well

Hotel_Name: The Park City Grand Plaza Kensington Hotel
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The location was perfect in a safe quiet beautiful neighborhood but also close to the Tube and lots of action Our room was spacious and immaculate with a large walk in closet and huge well equipped bathroom Staff was friendly and always ready to help The lounge was a perfect place for a nightcap after a busy day out on the town Great for couples We d stay here again in a heartbeat

Hotel_Name: The Park City Grand Plaza Kensington Hotel
Negative_Review: Chilly bathroom with cold tiled floor Not warned that our room had flight of steps up to bathroom and wardrobe Quite a long walk from nearest tube station Gloucester Road
Positive_Review: Friendly welcoming staff Early check in Good choice of breakfast Full English breakfast freshly cooked Comfortable beds Very quiet location Facility to leave luggage at the Concierge desk

Hotel_Name: The Park City Grand Plaza Kensington Hotel
Negative_Review: Slightly noisy at night double glazing would have held keep the noise from the street down but wasn t too bad
Positive_Review: Beautiful hotel in excellent location Didn t have breakfast but hotel room was luxurious and very large more like a suite Had a fantastic stay

Hotel_Name: The Park City Grand Plaza Kensington Hotel
Negative_Review: a group with 3 4 different reservations meant we had to wait a while to check in as only 1 member of staff on the desk the Bar staff were very quick to close up even though we would have stayed up and ordered more after 11pm
Positive_Review: bed was comfortable liked the toiletries etc provided in bathroom such as spare toothbrush and razor Brilliant size of room and ideally located a short walk from both gloucester road and earls court tube stations Price seems about average for London especially when I realised there were a lot of people in town due to national football game

Hotel_Name: The Park City Grand Plaza Kensington Hotel
Negative_Review: nothing negative to say
Positive_Review: Rooms were a good size and comfortable Breakfast was excellent and location very close to the station Have stayed in a number of hotels in Victoria but this is one that i would go back to

Hotel_Name: The Park City Grand Plaza Kensington Hotel
Negative_Review: Sheets were only changed once in 7 days staff moody at times while some were ok
Positive_Review: The location was great 10 min walk to Victoria Albert Museum and Natural History many neighborhood restaurants self service laundry around the corner buffet breakfast was good towels were changed out every day Upgraded us to a larger room huge by European standards

Hotel_Name: The Park City Grand Plaza Kensington Hotel
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The breakfast while not included was delicious and reasonably priced The staff was very accommodating including ordering a late night pizza for us

Hotel_Name: The Park City Grand Plaza Kensington Hotel
Negative_Review: There was a bad smell that lingered around the stairs and bathroom area both nights of our stay not there during the day Our electric sockets didn t work the first morning maintenance soon sorted a faulty kettle so I asked for some hot water to be sent to our room so I could make tea The hot water never arrived but they did replace the kettle Our room was fine other than the smell coming from the bathroom drain but our friends next door had some slats missing broken from the sofa bed
Positive_Review: The size of our bed and the room size in general was excellent Clean and tidy Wifi although not brilliant was free There s a safe and mini fridge in the room Location was good

Hotel_Name: The Park City Grand Plaza Kensington Hotel
Negative_Review: Nothing
Positive_Review: Everything about this hotel was great Very Freindly staff especially the young girls who worked in the restaurant couldn t do enough for you In a great location and easy access to earls court tube station

Hotel_Name: The Park City Grand Plaza Kensington Hotel
Negative_Review: The restaurant Dungeon location with no ambience no music rather unusual menu and food It felt as though the restaurant had just opened for business
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: The Park City Grand Plaza Kensington Hotel
Negative_Review: Didn t like that I requested late check yet I had a phone call from a gent at reception asking me to leave
Positive_Review: Space size of room no delays checking in or out clean smart impressed with this hotel excellent

Hotel_Name: The Park City Grand Plaza Kensington Hotel
Negative_Review: Breakfast not very varied no gluten free bread or dairy free milk and limited fresh fruit selection Duvet was too hot for my son to be able to sleep comfortably and yet no alternative option of blankets sheets in room No bathrobes
Positive_Review: Great room size excellent location really close to Kensington High Street and also museums very friendly and attentive staff listened carefully to our special requests Room was super clean

Hotel_Name: The Park City Grand Plaza Kensington Hotel
Negative_Review: The continental breakfast is a bit lacking given that it cost 10 pounds You can find good and cheaper breakfast place nearby but you need to walk for 10 minutes
Positive_Review: The hotel is on a quite street but not far from three different underground stations and many good restaurants and stores Our room is spacious for 3 people compared to what you usually get in Europe Overall we are very happy with the choice

Hotel_Name: The Park City Grand Plaza Kensington Hotel
Negative_Review: We did not have breakfast there this year as it was poor last year with little variety and fresh fruit
Positive_Review: Impeccable service from the staff polite to a fault Attractive Georgian building in the heart of South Kensington Earls Court with bar and lounge A comfortable well appointed room very quiet with a spacious bathroom Only 15 20 minutes walk from the Royal Albert Hall Holland Park Knightsbridge good restaurants pubs and delis close nearby and a decent Malaysian restaurant at the hotel itself The hotel has a gym and a business centre

Hotel_Name: The Park City Grand Plaza Kensington Hotel
Negative_Review: The restaurant on G F did not accept walk in customers at about 15 minutes before the formal closing time And we were forced to go out to find another restaurant in the area
Positive_Review: The staffs were very helpful and polite Our rooms and the common areas were very clean and tidy

Hotel_Name: The Park City Grand Plaza Kensington Hotel
Negative_Review: Nothing
Positive_Review: Stayed for one night with my son on the 31st August this year in a deluxe double room the hotel did not disappoint beautiful spacious room with everything you could need I wish we could have stayed an extra night staff were lovely very helpful I would most definitely stay here again

Hotel_Name: The Park City Grand Plaza Kensington Hotel
Negative_Review: The room we were given was too crowded as a triple with the sofa bed open Additionally I ignored the hotels that said the extra bed was a sofa bed but that s just what they gave us The carpet looked dirty
Positive_Review: The location is great and it s mostly on par with my other experiences in the same price range for hotels in London

Hotel_Name: The Park City Grand Plaza Kensington Hotel
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Very professional staff and excellent comfortable room Perfect location with so much to do in the area Particularly liked the availability of a free mobile with loads of tourist information and some free calls during our stay A lovely touch and much appreciated

Hotel_Name: The Park City Grand Plaza Kensington Hotel
Negative_Review: We booked an executive room with 2 beds a single and a double instead it was overbooked and we got a pull out couch We chose this hotel so my daughter can have a bed so it was unfortunate and paid more for this upgrade
Positive_Review: Loved the powerful blow dryer Great shower and ample towels

Hotel_Name: The Park City Grand Plaza Kensington Hotel
Negative_Review: We left ghd hair straighteners in room rang up next day to tell them They didn t careless Gave email never replied Rang up again they didn t find them thinking reporting to pilice
Positive_Review: Nice hotel

Hotel_Name: The Park City Grand Plaza Kensington Hotel
Negative_Review: My room looked onto a carpark but really I wasn t in it much so not a big problem
Positive_Review: I was only there for 1 night but the staff were great room great nice big room hard to get in London at this price I was upgraded I had to get to Heathrow was happy it was on the Blue tube line so easy cheap to get to the airport Approx 8 mins walk with luggage Didn t have breakfast or get chance to try most of the facilities as I was out about so can t comment on them Compared to other hotels in similar areas it was good value for money

Hotel_Name: The Park City Grand Plaza Kensington Hotel
Negative_Review: All good No complaints
Positive_Review: Very comfy and very clean Bed and facilities were excellent Nice breakfast and dining room Quiet area and easy access to 2 railway stations

Hotel_Name: The Park City Grand Plaza Kensington Hotel
Negative_Review: No Bar open on Sunday afternoon Air conditioning never fixed Complimentary water in room on Day 1 only Extension area at back of building dangerous as carpet was laid over lawn and not even Could be a trip hazard
Positive_Review: Location

Hotel_Name: The Park City Grand Plaza Kensington Hotel
Negative_Review: It s not obvious what s included in the prepaid breakfast The staff had some issues to explain this for the guests But they where nice and service minded
Positive_Review: Very nice and helpful staff

Hotel_Name: The Park City Grand Plaza Kensington Hotel
Negative_Review: Bathroom was very old fashioned and equipment difficult to use Bed linen was not of the best quality The entiry hotel would need a face lifting
Positive_Review: The room was nice and large

Hotel_Name: The Park City Grand Plaza Kensington Hotel
Negative_Review: Small hotel so arrived at a time when the concierge was on break Had to haul luggage up steps ourselves
Positive_Review: Room size was big Bathroom was big Staff were very nice

Hotel_Name: The Park City Grand Plaza Kensington Hotel
Negative_Review: The wifi connection was terrible in certain areas of the building
Positive_Review: Room was nice enough Staff were friendly Decent location if you don t mind a bit of a walk from the tube station Good hotel for a short stay

Hotel_Name: The Park City Grand Plaza Kensington Hotel
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Spacious comfortable deluxe double room Very clean Good location which is nice for a stroll Staff were nice and allowed us to check in early and leave our bags at the hotel after we checked out on our final day and pick them up later in the evening

Hotel_Name: The Park City Grand Plaza Kensington Hotel
Negative_Review: Room was full of sunny light incredible so it got too hot and we didn t know how to manage the temperature We didn t ask for help either and it was better at night Breakfast is the only thing that was not as well as the rest of the hotel although it was very correct
Positive_Review: Big clean and quiet room much bigger than expected and compared to so many other hotels in London Staff was very helpful Lots of amenities in the room to make it much more enjoyable Very close to tube stations and minutes walk from some of the main attractions

Hotel_Name: The Park City Grand Plaza Kensington Hotel
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: the hotel is in a great location on a quiet street off Cromwell Road near museums shopping and tube We had a triple room which worked well for me and my two daughters

Hotel_Name: The Park City Grand Plaza Kensington Hotel
Negative_Review: Atmosphere a little stiff Staff not overly helpful
Positive_Review: Location Excellent place to stay so close to Earlscourt station easy to get to anywhere Very quiet area lovely quiet hotel

Hotel_Name: The Park City Grand Plaza Kensington Hotel
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Hotel in city centre i was expecitng little bit noisy place but you couldnt hear anything people in other rooms or cars outside for minute i thought we are only customers there Well done When we arrived we were told that our room was upgrated which was nice Room nice clean and enough room for couple we stayed in room 214 Breakfast from 7 11 self service buffet plenty options Another good thing Hotel is less than 10 mins walking from tube stations so if you visiting London to see many things during short time its really handy So my next time in London i ll be staying here again Once again thank you Stan

Hotel_Name: The Park City Grand Plaza Kensington Hotel
Negative_Review: No bar for relaxing refreshments even there was one advertised signage in hotel We found it closed over 12 months ago Website needs updating
Positive_Review: Good location friendly staff

Hotel_Name: The Park City Grand Plaza Kensington Hotel
Negative_Review: The room I was allocated was cold and the heating air con was broken The staff tried to help but they couldn t help ultimately It was definitely the cheap room as there was 50 off in theory But one couldn t possibly pay full rate for this room
Positive_Review: Staff were very nice and the food from the resto was decent

Hotel_Name: The Park City Grand Plaza Kensington Hotel
Negative_Review: The room was uncomfortably warm disappointing breakfast buffet some grumpy staff at breakfast bathroom could have been cleaner
Positive_Review: Great location large room comfy bed

Hotel_Name: The Park City Grand Plaza Kensington Hotel
Negative_Review: I thought that it was a bit overpriced for what it was I have ordered a plate and knife upon arrival and the receptionist forgot to bring it to me so I had to call them again The room itself was very small and the ceiling was dirty The windows wouldn t open enough and the room was either too warm or too cold There were not enough towels either in my opinion There were no slippers and no robes which I thought was very odd The duvet was a bit too small for the size of the bed There were not enough hangers for two people The mini bar only had two complimentary bottles of water but no snacks or small alcoholic beverages The room also seemed a bit dark The drains in the sink and tub wouldn t let the water run down properly which I thought was a bit gross since no one wants to stand in a pool of soapy water when they re taking a shower
Positive_Review: The room was clean and I enjoyed the toiletries Overall my stay was reasonably up to standard The staff were friendly and the maids did their job well I loved the sound system in the room I thought that was very convenient as I do enjoy to listen to music when I get ready The safe was spacious which I also thought was very nice The bedding was nice and crisp easy on the touch and the TV was large and conveniently placed with lots of channels to enjoy I also really liked the fact that you had to take a little staircase to the bathroom I found that very sweet and rustic

Hotel_Name: The Park City Grand Plaza Kensington Hotel
Negative_Review: Directions Lexham Gardens goes round in a circle and out to the sides a bit like a tennis racket with a flag on top I arrived by bus and ended up walking all the way around LG in the rain before I found the hotel at the opposite end Online search by Postcode unhelpful as it didn t reveal the shape of LG nor the fact that the house numbers went up one side and down the other
Positive_Review: Hotel was a modern refurbishment of an old building It was nicely decorated modern but not cold or dark I d been a bit concerned with everything being online that the place would be automated but the staff were welcoming and pleasant

Hotel_Name: The Park City Grand Plaza Kensington Hotel
Negative_Review: The air conditioning was good when we wanted it warm but the cold setting didn t seem to work
Positive_Review: The bed was extremely comfy and the room was spotless

Hotel_Name: The Park City Grand Plaza Kensington Hotel
Negative_Review: The room and the hallway were unpleasantly warm when the airconditioning was switched off
Positive_Review: Quiet location near the museums Has all the amenities a modern traveller needs such as european socket kettle wifi fridge and wide screen tv

Hotel_Name: The Park City Grand Plaza Kensington Hotel
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: We liked the friendly welcome when we checked in Compared to other places we have stayed in London this place was very quiet and the bed was comfortable We had a tastefully furnished spacious room and there was everything we could have wished for supplied in the room plentiful good quality toiletries and even complimentary bottled water in the fridge We will certainly make this our regular place to stay whilst we are in London

Hotel_Name: The Park City Grand Plaza Kensington Hotel
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The room was spacious and clean The neighbourhood was very quiet There is a big food store just 5 minutes away The underground station Gloucester Road is also withing a walking distance 8 10 mins

Hotel_Name: The Park City Grand Plaza Kensington Hotel
Negative_Review: We notice straight away that the bathroom was a wet room and we didn t think it would be an issue but later on the night I had a shower to find the room steamed up straight away which meant when you came out the shower it was very hard to dry yourself because of all of the steam we tried looking for a fan to put on when we were in the shower but there wasn t one this is something that needs to be looked into We also couldn t find a room manual on where everything was and what was in the room which also meant that the room was very very cold in the morning even with the heating full on By the third day I ask a member of staff about the heating and they did sort it but the room only stayed hot for 15 minutes and then a fan came on to cool the room down it is winter at the end of the day not summer we are lucky we come from scotland where it is colder than London Another we didn t like about the hotel is the fact it was all Malaysian food which isn t to our taste and we wouldn t have stayed here if we knew this before we booked and this wasn t clear when we booked this hotel We always had to make sure we had eaten before heading back to the hotel As for Breakfast it was a total rip off 9 90 for a continental breakfast and the food wasn t even fresh I wouldn t recommend the breakfast here I would eat out if you find somewhere nice
Positive_Review: This hotel was in a great location for walking to Earls Court station to enjoy all the sites You are only minutes away from Harrods and Kensington Palace you don t need to use the tubes all the time you could walk there within 15 minutes We stayed in a triple room which had plenty of room for all of us without feeling like we were on top of each other the room was very clean and tidy The staff were very helpful when you needed them The hotel also let us leave our bags until our flight later on and even booked us a taxi to be there for us collecting our bags I would maybe stay here again if I couldn t get anywhere else in London

Hotel_Name: The Park City Grand Plaza Kensington Hotel
Negative_Review: The food wasn t good value for money at all The staff on our first day were great help other staff weren t very helpful And the atmosphere was very quiet
Positive_Review: The room was very good layout how it had stairs to the bathroom was an excellent touch And very comfortable bedding

Hotel_Name: The Park City Grand Plaza Kensington Hotel
Negative_Review: The room was extremely hot When we asked the hotel staff about the air conditioning and why it was blowing out warm air when set to Cold we were told by a very rude member of staff that because it was winter we had no option about the temperature and would have to live with it being too hot Not comfortable to sleep when it is that warm Also bathroom had no fan so by the time the first person had a shower all the surfaces were soaking wet with condensation and was far too hot
Positive_Review: The room size was very good for London jotels

Hotel_Name: The Park City Grand Plaza Kensington Hotel
Negative_Review: More breakfast tea sugar and Milk for the room
Positive_Review: The bed was very comfortable the room was very quiet great amount of space for myself and my partner bathroom was amazing very very nice hotel

Hotel_Name: The Park City Grand Plaza Kensington Hotel
Negative_Review: Perhaps minor things but pillows on the bed were small definitely not standard size pillows which seemed odd when bed is so big Also bottled water was not replenished on 2nd night and only one English breakfast tea bag provided which meant both of us could not have a cup of tea I was left disappointed especially as hotel is not cheap I would not class as 4 based on this lack of attention to detail
Positive_Review: Stayed for a couple of nights following a trip to the Albert Hall Hotel in a good location and within easy walking distance of the Albert Hall tube station etc Room was small but very clean and reasonably comfortable Staff were friendly

Hotel_Name: The Park City Grand Plaza Kensington Hotel
Negative_Review: having to pack up and leave
Positive_Review: Once inside this hotel just gets bigger and bigger Room was massive which it needed to be because of the size of the bed Even had a single bed in the same room Quality of alarm clock Bose Free WiFi Staff were really friendly

Hotel_Name: The Park City Grand Plaza Kensington Hotel
Negative_Review: We had stayed here before but felt it had gone downhill since our last visit The breakfast was poor in terms of quality and choice Our room was cold and the heating made no difference
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: The Park City Grand Plaza Kensington Hotel
Negative_Review: Lift out of order Heating controls on bath stuck at very high temperature so had to run bath leave for 40 mins and then use kettle to add cold water
Positive_Review: Friendly staff Clean room

Hotel_Name: The Park City Grand Plaza Kensington Hotel
Negative_Review: Room disappointing despite having booked in advance felt that this was the last room in the place Room had a spare bed filling the space which wasn t required and an adapted bathroom also not required Kettle didn t work but was promptly replaced No cooked breakfast available as chef hadn t turned up
Positive_Review: Location is good Have had brilliant stays here previously

Hotel_Name: The Park City Grand Plaza Kensington Hotel
Negative_Review: We didn t make use of the dinning or bar facilities because our stay was relatively short
Positive_Review: The standard of the room was excellent and it was extremely well looked after The standard of cleanliness was also excellent All the staff were good and really accommodating altogether a pleasant experience

Hotel_Name: The Park City Grand Plaza Kensington Hotel
Negative_Review: Nothing
Positive_Review: The staff were extremely helpful my son and daughter arrived separately and not together and the staff kept us all informed of who were where Comfortable room very good value for money all in a super location Lovely to be in London for a while

Hotel_Name: The Park City Grand Plaza Kensington Hotel
Negative_Review: We arrived into our family suite and we had very young children apparently the heating was not working in that particular room our kids were very cold but they did move us into another room but then we had to sort the kids out again and move all our luggage again was a bit annoying having to move rooms
Positive_Review: The staff and the hotel were very nice staff were very accommodating to our needs

Hotel_Name: The Park City Grand Plaza Kensington Hotel
Negative_Review: We liked everything Excellent choice
Positive_Review: Very nice and professional staff always available and with the willing to help Good localization near subway 7min walking Hotel with all commodities big rooms good for childrens excellent and comfortable beds Very clean Picturesque area and architecture

Hotel_Name: The Park City Grand Plaza Kensington Hotel
Negative_Review: Not exactly where in Kensington that I wanted to be Not much around but the tube station was about a 8 10minute walk away
Positive_Review: The Staff was great and extremely accommodating

Hotel_Name: The Park City Grand Plaza Kensington Hotel
Negative_Review: I do not believe this can be rated as 4 stars hotel hence the rate per night is a bit too high compared to the quality of the hotel itself
Positive_Review: Great location room clean and spacious Helpful staff at breakfast

Hotel_Name: The Park City Grand Plaza Kensington Hotel
